titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: INTENDED CLINICAL CARE INTENSITY CODE (MENTAL HEALTH) - Description

body.p: INTENDED CLINICAL CARE INTENSITY CODE (MENTAL HEALTH) is the same as attribute CLINICAL CARE INTENSITY for the Mental Health Services Data Set .

div.p: National Code descriptions have been updated to remove National Code headings and add prefixes. The Data Set specifications that contain this item will be updated in the next version of the Information Standard where it is not already correct.
